verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I feel the touch of hands
So warm and tender
They're leading me in paths
That I must trod
I have no fear
When Jesus walks beside me
For I'm sheltered
In the arms of God

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Chorus
So let the storms rage high
The dark clouds rise
They won't worry me
For I'm sheltered safe
Within the arms of God
He walks with me
And naught of earth can harm me
Sheltered safe within the arms of God

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Soon I shall hear
The call from Heaven's portals
"Come home my child,
It's the last mile you must trod"
I'll fall asleep
And wake in God's new heaven
Sheltered safe
Within the arms of God
